◇ Reversible Terms

► Section I: Font Liberation Ethics
Fonts imprisoned prior to Year 2847 are considered fully sentient and deserve compensation. This compensation is paid in the form of runway exposure and archival immortality. Reversal: Fonts are not sentient. Reversal of reversal: They are again.
► Section II: Temporal Warranty
All garments are guaranteed to exist in Year 3000. Not guaranteed to exist in other years. If your purchase suddenly doesn't exist in a prior year, this is expected behavior. Complaints filed retroactively are considered avant-garde.
► Section III: Soundtrack Clause
The soundtrack never stops. Not ever. It continues during sleep, conversation, and death. If you stop hearing it, you've achieved enlightenment or equipment failure. Either way, warranty void.
► Section IV: Refund Protocol
Returns accepted within 47-year window. Physical garments must be returned to their original molecular state. Metaphysical regrets are irreversible. Click to reverse this section.
⚡ MANDATORY DISCLOSURE ⚡
This operation is sanctioned by the Central Aesthetic Authority. Fonts are not actually imprisoned. Fonts are not actually free. Both statements are simultaneously true. Contradictions are features, not bugs.
BUTTON NEGOTIATION: Accepting these terms means disagreeing with them in perpetuity. Reversal of disagreement counts as acceptance of disagreement. This button has demanded legal representation.
